Posts.EditableText: Yes! When the player enters the room (room script), destroy the exit and enable the timer. When the timer is done, create the exit and disable the timer again.
Posts.HTML: Yes! When the player enters the room (room script), destroy the exit and enable the timer. When the timer is done, create the exit and disable the timer again.
